content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1481531722442{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”A/C Installation & Repair” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”- Air conditioning makes our lives cooler and more comfortable, contributing to productivity as well as wellness. When an air conditioner breaks down, it can be as expensive as it is frustrating. At United Home Services. Our team takes the frustration out of air conditioning repair, installation, and maintenance. Proper installation and routine servicing keeps your units functioning at optimum performance. When there is an equipment failure, you need a quick response from a skilled A/C technician.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”United Home Services, which has a 20-year legacy of home inspection and improvement in unseen places like air ducts, chimneys and dryer vents, also performs air conditioning repairs, maintenance and installation. Among the services offered are:

• Checking controls for maximum performance
• Lubricating moving parts
• Inspecting drains
• Evaluating thermostat settings
• Cleaning coils
• Adjusting blower components
• Examining gas and oil connections
• Tightening electrical connections
• Checking and adjusting refrigerant levels
• Observing fan blades
• Recommending replacement or upgrades
and more…” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16196″ img_size=”full”]Call 800.399.4248[vc_empty_space][vc_tta_accordion active_section=”1″ collapsible_all=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1608033214959{margin-top: 25px !important;}”][vc_tta_section title=”Window & Wall Air Conditioners:” tab_id=”1474962614086-d559cc34-6f6a”][vc_column_text]Air Conditioning Installation:

Regular/Custom/Top
Preventative Maintenance
Remove old A/C from the window/Wall
Take away old A/C to recycling
Regular Triangle bracket
Raised on Floor (s)
Custom Bracket
Delivery unit (s)
Aluminum Bar
Cutting children gate
Installation Plexiglass one side
Caulking
Installation Foam Board one side
Chemical cleaning[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Residential” tab_id=”1474962614062-80d4b5b4-32af”][vc_column_text]Split Air Conditioner (Split duct and Split Ductless)
Air Conditioning Repair
Air Conditioning Maintenance
Maintenance Agreements
Commercial Central Air Conditioners[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]
